sections.css:
body
  min-width: 320px
  font-weight: $font-weight

// Specific body styles that should be only used for the styleguide
.body
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-size: $font-size-base
  line-height: $line-height-base
  color: $text-color
  min-width: 320px
  font-weight: $font-weight

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 300
  src: local("Roboto Light"), local("Roboto-Light"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/Hgo13k-tfSpn0qi1SFdUfVtXRa8TVwTICgirnJhmVJw.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/Hgo13k-tfSpn0qi1SFdUfT8E0i7KZn-EPnyo3HZu7kw.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 400
  src: local("Roboto"), local("Roboto-Regular"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/CWB0XYA8bzo0kSThX0UTuA.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/2UX7WLTfW3W8TclTUvlFyQ.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 700
  src: local("Roboto Bold"), local("Roboto-Bold"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/d-6IYplOFocCacKzxwXSOFtXRa8TVwTICgirnJhmVJw.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/d-6IYplOFocCacKzxwXSOD8E0i7KZn-EPnyo3HZu7kw.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto Condensed'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 300
  src: local("Roboto Condensed Light"), local("RobotoCondensed-Light"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotocondensed/v13/b9QBgL0iMZfDSpmcXcE8nBBQ_Gf4FfI8J4SYljBAylk.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotocondensed/v13/b9QBgL0iMZfDSpmcXcE8nNeiznanRB67rGZDYkMvKPc.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto Condensed'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 400
  src: local("Roboto Condensed"), local("RobotoCondensed-Regular"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotocondensed/v13/Zd2E9abXLFGSr9G3YK2MsDAdhzWOYhqHvOZMRGaEyPo.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotocondensed/v13/Zd2E9abXLFGSr9G3YK2MsFzqCfRpIA3W6ypxnPISCPA.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto Slab'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 400
  src: local("Roboto Slab Regular"), local("RobotoSlab-Regular"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotoslab/v6/y7lebkjgREBJK96VQi37Zo4P5ICox8Kq3LLUNMylGO4.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotoslab/v6/y7lebkjgREBJK96VQi37ZobN6UDyHWBl620a-IRfuBk.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto Slab'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 700
  src: local("Roboto Slab Bold"), local("RobotoSlab-Bold"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotoslab/v6/dazS1PrQQuCxC3iOAJFEJYlIZu-HDpmDIZMigmsroc4.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotoslab/v6/dazS1PrQQuCxC3iOAJFEJTqR_3kx9_hJXbbyU8S6IN0.woff) format("woff")

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills
  // Fix for centering pills with text-center class in parent element.
  display: inline-block
  > li
    & > a
      color: $gray-light
      &:hover
        background-color: transparent
        color: $text-color
    // Active state
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-color
        background-color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills--large
  > li > a
    font-family: $headings-font-family
    font-size: $font-size-h2

.nav-pills--arrows
  &:after
    border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
    width: 100%
  > li
    margin-bottom: -1px
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        +arrow($gray-light, white, "bottom", "in", 10px, 25px)
        background: transparent
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg
sections.renderMarkup:
• Home
  • Profile
  • Messages

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none
  margin: -8px 0 0
  overflow: hidden
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative
  z-index: 1
  &:after
    content: ''
    width: 100%
    display: block
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid
    position: absolute
    bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important
  font-size: $font-size-base
  padding: 0
  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important
  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)
    line-height: $line-height-computed
    padding: 13px 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0
  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important
    z-index: 1
    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important
    +shadow($gray-lighter, 0, 0, 5px, 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid
        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid
        margin: 0
        color: $gray-base
        background-color: $tabs-active-background

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0
  margin: 50px 0 40px !important

  & > li
    padding: 0 !important
    margin: 0 !important
    &:before
      display: none

    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none
      border-radius: 25px !important
      color: $gray-lighter

      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none
        text-decoration: underline
        color: $gray-darker

    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $blue-dark
       color: #fff !important

    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker
        line-height: 8px
        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px
          position: relative
          top: 4px
          display: inline-block

    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"
          right: 10px

    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"
          left: 10px

    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block
          width: 100%
          text-align: left
      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px

      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px
sections.renderMarkup:
• 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • …

sections.markup:
Panel title #1

First panel body

Panel title #2

Second panel body
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group
  .panel
    padding-bottom: 20px
    & + .panel
      margin-top: 0
      padding-top: 20px
      border-top: 1px solid $brand-primary-gray !important
      border-radius: 0
    &:last-child
      padding-bottom: 0

.panel-default
  border: none !important
  +box-shadow(none)
  .panel-heading
    padding: 0
    border-radius: 0 !important
    background: $gray-lighter
    a
      outline: 0
      text-decoration: none
  .panel-title
    padding: 15px 15px
    margin: 0
    @extend .h4
  .panel-body
    margin-top: 20px
    padding: 0
    border: none !important
    &:before,
    &:after
      display: none
    & > *
      &:last-child
        padding-bottom: 0
        margin-bottom: 0
        border-bottom: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group--horizontal
  +rotate(-90, right top)
  z-index: 100
  width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  margin: 30px 0 0
  .panel + .panel
    padding-top: 1px
    border: none !important
  .panel
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding-bottom: 0
  .panel-heading,
  .panel-collapse
    width: 100%
  .panel-collapse
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
  .panel-title
    +rotate(180, right 50% 0)
    font-family: $font-family-base
    font-weight: $font-weight
    text-transform: none
    padding: 5px 10px
    height: 30px
  .panel-body
    background-color: $panel-group-horizontal-bg
    position: relative
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    margin: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small
    ul
      margin-left: 0
      padding-left: 10px
      list-style: none
      li:before
        content: ''
        margin: 5px 0 0 -10px
        float: left
        +circle(white, 1px, $orange)
        width: 6px
        height: 6px
        display: block
    big
      font-family: $headings-font-family
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      font-size: $font-size-h3
  .panel__rotate-wrapper
    +rotate(90, right top)
    position: absolute
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    right: -$panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    bottom: -$panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding: 20px !important

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel.is-active
  .panel-heading
    background-color: $orange
    +arrow($orange, $orange, "bottom", "out", 10px, 30px)
    .panel-title
      color: #fff
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
sections.renderMarkup:
Panel title #1

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small
  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,
  & > tfoot > tr > td
    text-align: center
    vertical-align: middle
  & > thead > tr > th
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-weight: $font-weight
    background-color: $table-bg-header
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
    line-height: $line-height-computed / 2
    padding-top: 4px
    padding-bottom: 4px
    text-align: left

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.table-bordered
  border-left: none
  border-right: none
  > thead > tr
    > th,
    > td
      border-bottom: none

.table-striped
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd)
    background-color: transparent
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(even)
    background-color: $table-bg-accent
sections.renderMarkup:
1 col 2 col 3 col
1 col 2 col 3 col
1 col 2 col 3 col

sections.description: Layouts and page composition related elements

variables.name: font-family-serif
variables.value: "Roboto Slab", Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif

section.css:
body
  min-width: 320px
  font-weight: $font-weight

// Specific body styles that should be only used for the styleguide
.body
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-size: $font-size-base
  line-height: $line-height-base
  color: $text-color
  min-width: 320px
  font-weight: $font-weight

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 300
  src: local("Roboto Light"), local("Roboto-Light"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/Hgo13k-tfSpn0qi1SFdUfVtXRa8TVwTICgirnJhmVJw.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/Hgo13k-tfSpn0qi1SFdUfT8E0i7KZn-EPnyo3HZu7kw.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 400
  src: local("Roboto"), local("Roboto-Regular"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/CWB0XYA8bzo0kSThX0UTuA.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/2UX7WLTfW3W8TclTUvlFyQ.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 700
  src: local("Roboto Bold"), local("Roboto-Bold"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/d-6IYplOFocCacKzxwXSOFtXRa8TVwTICgirnJhmVJw.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/d-6IYplOFocCacKzxwXSOD8E0i7KZn-EPnyo3HZu7kw.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto Condensed'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 300
  src: local("Roboto Condensed Light"), local("RobotoCondensed-Light"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotocondensed/v13/b9QBgL0iMZfDSpmcXcE8nBBQ_Gf4FfI8J4SYljBAylk.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotocondensed/v13/b9QBgL0iMZfDSpmcXcE8nNeiznanRB67rGZDYkMvKPc.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto Condensed'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 400

  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 400
  src: local("Roboto Slab Regular"), local("RobotoSlab-Regular"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotoslab/v6/y7lebkjgREBJK96VQi37Zo4P5ICox8Kq3LLUNMylGO4.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/robotoslab/v6/y7lebkjgREBJK96VQi37ZobN6UDyHWBl620a-IRfuBk.woff) format("woff")

  font-family: 'Roboto Slab'

  font-weight: 700

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills
  // Fix for centering pills with text-center class in parent element.
  display: inline-block
  > li
    & > a
      color: $gray-light
      &:hover
        background-color: transparent
        color: $text-color
    // Active state
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-color
        background-color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills--large
  > li > a
    font-family: $headings-font-family
    font-size: $font-size-h2

.nav-pills--arrows
  &:after
    border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
    width: 100%
  > li
    margin-bottom: -1px
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        +arrow($gray-light, white, "bottom", "in", 10px, 25px)
        background: transparent
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg
section.renderMarkup:
• Home
  • Profile
  • Messages

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none
  margin: -8px 0 0
  overflow: hidden
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative
  z-index: 1
  &:after
    content: ''
    width: 100%
    display: block
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid
    position: absolute
    bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important
  font-size: $font-size-base
  padding: 0
  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important
  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)
    line-height: $line-height-computed
    padding: 13px 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0
  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important
    z-index: 1
    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important
    +shadow($gray-lighter, 0, 0, 5px, 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid
        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid
        margin: 0
        color: $gray-base
        background-color: $tabs-active-background
section.renderMarkup:

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0
  margin: 50px 0 40px !important

  & > li
    padding: 0 !important
    margin: 0 !important
    &:before
      display: none

    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none
      border-radius: 25px !important
      color: $gray-lighter

      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none
        text-decoration: underline
        color: $gray-darker

    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $blue-dark
       color: #fff !important

    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker
        line-height: 8px
        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px
          position: relative
          top: 4px
          display: inline-block

    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"
          right: 10px

    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"
          left: 10px

    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block
          width: 100%
          text-align: left
      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px

      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px
section.renderMarkup:
• 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • …

section.markup:
Panel title #1

First panel body

Panel title #2

Second panel body
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group
  .panel
    padding-bottom: 20px
    & + .panel
      margin-top: 0
      padding-top: 20px
      border-top: 1px solid $brand-primary-gray !important
      border-radius: 0
    &:last-child
      padding-bottom: 0

.panel-default
  border: none !important
  +box-shadow(none)
  .panel-heading
    padding: 0
    border-radius: 0 !important
    background: $gray-lighter
    a
      outline: 0
      text-decoration: none
  .panel-title
    padding: 15px 15px
    margin: 0
    @extend .h4
  .panel-body
    margin-top: 20px
    padding: 0
    border: none !important
    &:before,
    &:after
      display: none
    & > *
      &:last-child
        padding-bottom: 0
        margin-bottom: 0
        border-bottom: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group--horizontal
  +rotate(-90, right top)
  z-index: 100
  width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  margin: 30px 0 0
  .panel + .panel
    padding-top: 1px
    border: none !important
  .panel
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding-bottom: 0
  .panel-heading,
  .panel-collapse
    width: 100%
  .panel-collapse
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
  .panel-title
    +rotate(180, right 50% 0)
    font-family: $font-family-base
    font-weight: $font-weight
    text-transform: none
    padding: 5px 10px
    height: 30px
  .panel-body
    background-color: $panel-group-horizontal-bg
    position: relative
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    margin: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small
    ul
      margin-left: 0
      padding-left: 10px
      list-style: none
      li:before
        content: ''
        margin: 5px 0 0 -10px
        float: left
        +circle(white, 1px, $orange)
        width: 6px
        height: 6px
        display: block
    big
      font-family: $headings-font-family
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      font-size: $font-size-h3
  .panel__rotate-wrapper
    +rotate(90, right top)
    position: absolute
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    right: -$panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    bottom: -$panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding: 20px !important

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel.is-active
  .panel-heading
    background-color: $orange
    +arrow($orange, $orange, "bottom", "out", 10px, 30px)
    .panel-title
      color: #fff
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
section.renderMarkup:
Panel title #1

First panel body

Panel title #2

section.markup:
1 col 2 col 3 col
1 col 2 col 3 col
1 col 2 col 3 col
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small
  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,
  & > tfoot > tr > td
    text-align: center
    vertical-align: middle
  & > thead > tr > th
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-weight: $font-weight
    background-color: $table-bg-header
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
    line-height: $line-height-computed / 2
    padding-top: 4px
    padding-bottom: 4px
    text-align: left

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.table-bordered
  border-left: none
  border-right: none
  > thead > tr
    > th,
    > td
      border-bottom: none

.table-striped
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd)
    background-color: transparent
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(even)
    background-color: $table-bg-accent
section.renderMarkup:
1 col 2 col 3 col
1 col 2 col 3 col
1 col 2 col 3 col
